# Vulnerable dependencies for testing Trivy CVE scanner
flask==0.12.2  # CVE-2018-1000656 (XSS vulnerability)
requests==2.6.0  # CVE-2018-18074 (Redirect vulnerability)
django==1.11.0  # Multiple CVEs (CVE-2019-6975, CVE-2019-3498)
pyyaml==3.12  # CVE-2017-18342 (Arbitrary code execution)
jinja2==2.8  # CVE-2019-10906 (Sandbox escape)
pillow==5.0.0  # CVE-2019-16865 (DoS vulnerability)
urllib3==1.23  # CVE-2019-11324 (CRLF injection)
sqlalchemy==1.2.0  # CVE-2019-7164 (SQL injection)
cryptography==2.1  # CVE-2018-10903 (GCM tag forgery)
